Business_AssetObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Business_AssetObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Business_AssetObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to the Business Asset which useful life need to be corrected or adjusted

validation.validation: There is a pending event for the asset that should be completed before this asset transaction can be processed.
validation.description: There is a pending event for the asset that should be completed before this asset transaction can be processed.

validation.validation: Cannot update useful life for this asset since the accounting treatment is not depreciable capital
validation.description: Cannot update useful life for this asset since the accounting treatment is not depreciable capital

validation.validation: Cannot update useful life for this asset since accounting information has not been assigned yet
validation.description: Cannot update useful life for this asset since accounting information has not been assigned yet

validation.validation: Cannot update the useful life of this asset since it is either disposed or pending disposal
validation.description: Cannot update the useful life of this asset since it is either disposed or pending disposal

validation.validation: Cannot update the useful life of this asset since it is out of service
Cannot update useful life of an asset loaded into Workday as fully depreciated
validation.description: Cannot update useful life of an asset loaded into Workday as fully depreciated

validation.validation: You cannot adjust the useful life of this asset due to a problem with its depreciation start date not aligning with the first period in the depreciation schedule.  Please contact Support for assistance.
validation.description: You cannot adjust the useful life of this asset due to a problem with its depreciation start date not aligning with the first period in the depreciation schedule.  Please contact Support for assistance.

validation.validation: Cannot update the useful life of this asset since it has been removed
The asset is part of a lease contract. You can't update the useful life for term books.
There must be a complete supplier contract amendment for the asset before Workday can process this asset transaction.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

description: Business Process Parameters provide the ability to auto-submit to the business process.

Business_Asset_Useful_Life_Update_Data.description: Indicator to whether to perform Correct Useful Life or Adjust Useful Life. Enter 0 to correct useful life  or 1 to adjust useful life

validation.validation: Cannot correct useful life for assets converted from another system into Workday
validation.description: Cannot correct useful life for assets converted from another system into Workday

validation.validation: Useful life correction cannot be performed on assets with post acquisition adjustments, life adjustments, impairments, reclassifications, partial disposals or suspended periods
validation.description: Useful life correction cannot be performed on assets with post acquisition adjustments, life adjustments, impairments, reclassifications, partial disposals or suspended periods

Business_Asset_Useful_Life_Update_Data.description: Date of useful life adjustment. Required if value of Useful Life Adjust is 1 or 'y'. Must be blank if Useful Life Adjust is 0 or 'n'.

validation.validation: Adjustment Date cannot be less than Date Acquired of the Business Asset
validation.description: Adjustment Date cannot be less than Date Acquired of the Business Asset

validation.validation: Adjustment Date is required when the option Adjust Useful Life is 1 (true)
validation.description: Adjustment Date is required when the option Adjust Useful Life is 1 (true)

validation.validation: Adjustment date should not be entered when Adjust Useful Life is 0 (false)
Adjustment date for this transaction cannot be prior to last reclassification date for asset
Transaction effective date of this transaction cannot be prior to last partial disposal date for asset
validation.description: Transaction effective date of this transaction cannot be prior to last partial disposal date for asset

validation.validation: Ledger Period must exist for the Adjustment Date.
validation.description: Ledger Period must exist for the Adjustment Date.

validation.validation: Adjustment Date cannot be less than Depreciation Start Date
validation.description: Adjustment Date cannot be less than Depreciation Start Date

validation.validation: You are entering a useful life adjustment with an EARLIER effective date than an existing cost adjustment or useful life adjustment.
validation.description: You are entering a useful life adjustment with an EARLIER effective date than an existing cost adjustment or useful life adjustment.

validation.validation: Adjustment Date cannot be AFTER end date of of the last period in the depreciation schedule
validation.description: Adjustment Date cannot be AFTER end date of of the last period in the depreciation schedule

validation.validation: Depreciation start date for useful life adjustment cannot be earlier than last resume date.
validation.description: Depreciation start date for useful life adjustment cannot be earlier than last resume date.

Business_Asset_Useful_Life_Update_Data.description: New value for useful life in periods

validation.validation: Useful Life cannot be more than 200 years. Useful life in years is useful life in periods divided by number of periods in the company's fiscal year.
validation.description: Useful Life cannot be more than 200 years. Useful life in years is useful life in periods divided by number of periods in the company's fiscal year.

validation.validation: When depreciation is based on the number of days per period, all the fiscal years / periods for an asset's useful life must already be created in order to calculate the depreciation amount for each period correctly.   In order to complete the accounting setup for this asset, you will first need to create additional fiscal years / periods for the fiscal schedule of this asset's company.
validation.description: When depreciation is based on the number of days per period, all the fiscal years / periods for an asset's useful life must already be created in order to calculate the depreciation amount for each period correctly.   In order to complete the accounting setup for this asset, you will first need to create additional fiscal years / periods for the fiscal schedule of this asset's company.

Business_Asset_Useful_Life_Update_Data.description: Update the depreciation end date of contract assets.

validation.validation: Fiscal Period must exist for depreciation end date
validation.description: Fiscal Period must exist for depreciation end date

Asset_BookObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Asset_BookObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Asset_BookObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Asset_Useful_Life_Update_Data.description: Reference to asset books that are used by the asset. Enter asset books if you want to restrict the useful life to specific books. To update useful life for all asset books, leave this field blank.

validation.validation: Restricted to Book is required when the asset has at least one fully depreciated book
At least one of the Restricted to Books is not valid for asset. Only assets already defined and not loaded into Workday or transferred from different company fully depreciated are valid.
At least one of the Restricted to Books is not valid for the asset because it uses a Declining Balance depreciation method. You cannot adjust the useful life for those assets books.
You cannot update the useful life of this asset because it uses a Declining Balance depreciation method.

description: Business Asset useful life update data

validation.validation: Depreciation End Date must be on or after the Date the Asset is Acquired.
validation.description: Depreciation End Date must be on or after the Date the Asset is Acquired.

validation.validation: Useful Life in Periods is required and must be different than the current Useful Life.
validation.description: Useful Life in Periods is required and must be different than the current Useful Life.

validation.validation: New useful life periods cannot be less than number of periods already depreciated as of the adjustment date.
validation.description: New useful life periods cannot be less than number of periods already depreciated as of the adjustment date.

validation.validation: Depreciation End Date is required and must be different than the current Depreciation End Date.
validation.description: Depreciation End Date is required and must be different than the current Depreciation End Date.

validation.validation: The Depreciation End Date and Useful Life Periods must have different values than the current Depreciation End Date and Useful Life.
validation.description: The Depreciation End Date and Useful Life Periods must have different values than the current Depreciation End Date and Useful Life.

validation.validation: Depreciation End Date cannot be prior to depreciation start date of the transaction effective date
validation.description: Depreciation End Date cannot be prior to depreciation start date of the transaction effective date
